= corrupt | BrE kəˈrʌpt, AmE kəˈrəpt | [[/wordsi|<-Back to List]] =
`使损失/使乱码`

A.adjective

① (immoral) 腐败的 fǔbài de ‹society›; 腐化堕落的 fǔhuà duòluò de ‹life›

② (willing to accept bribes) 受贿的 shòuhuì de ‹official›

▸ corrupt practices

贪污腐败

③ (containing errors) 有错误的 yǒu cuòwù de ‹text, files›; Computing 有乱码的 yǒu luànmǎ de ‹file, data›

B.transitive verb

① (pervert) 使…腐化堕落 shǐ… fǔhuà duòluò ‹person›; 败坏 bàihuài ‹morals›

② (through bribery) 贿赂 huìlù ‹official›

③ (introduce errors into) 使…出错 shǐ… chūcuò ‹text, language›

▸ the data/file has become corrupted

数据/文件被破坏了

C.intransitive verb

使人腐化堕落 shǐ rén fǔhuà duòluò
